title: Ranji Trophy 2024 Round 1 live updates: Defending champions Mumbai kick off season against Baroda
description: The first round of the 2024 Ranji Trophy is set to get underway on Friday, October 11. Here are the latest updates from Round 1.
author: Rahul Iyer
excerpt: The first round of the 2024 Ranji Trophy is set to get underway on Friday, October 11. Here are the latest updates from Round 1.
text: The first round of the 2024 Ranji Trophy is set to get underway on Friday, October 11. Here are the latest updates from Round 1. This season of the competition will have more than a few big names taking part. The likes of Ajinkya Rahane, Prithvi Shaw and Shreyas Iyer will all turn out for defending champions Mumbai, who take on Baroda in their opening fixture. Other Indian Test players set to be in action are Mayank Agarwal (Karnataka), Jaydev Unadkat (Saurashtra) and Ishan Kishan (Jharkhand). Ruturaj Gaikwad, Tilak Varma and R Sai Kishore will lead Maharashtra, Hyderabad and Tamil Nadu respectively. html:
The first round of the 2024 Ranji Trophy is set to get underway on Friday, October 11. Here are the latest updates from Round 1.

This season of the competition will have more than a few big names taking part. The likes of Ajinkya Rahane, Prithvi Shaw and Shreyas Iyer will all turn out for defending champions Mumbai, who take on Baroda in their opening fixture.

Other Indian Test players set to be in action are Mayank Agarwal (Karnataka), Jaydev Unadkat (Saurashtra) and Ishan Kishan (Jharkhand). Ruturaj Gaikwad, Tilak Varma and R Sai Kishore will lead Maharashtra, Hyderabad and Tamil Nadu respectively.

Ranji Trophy 2024 Round 1 live updates

16 hours ago

Round 1 fixtures, Elite Group D

The following Elite Group D matches are scheduled for the first round of the Ranji Trophy, on October 11:

Assam v Jharkhand

Chandigarh v Railways

Chhattisgarh v Delhi

Tamil Nadu v Saurashtra

16 hours ago

Round 1 fixtures, Elite Group C

The following Elite Group C matches are scheduled for the first round of the Ranji Trophy, on October 11:

Madhya Pradesh v Karnataka

Uttar Pradesh v Bengal

Haryana v Bihar

Kerala v Punjab

16 hours ago

Round 1 fixtures, Elite Group B

The following Elite Group B matches are scheduled for the first round of the Ranji Trophy, on October 11:

Hyderabad v Gujarat

Himachal Pradesh v Uttarakhand

Rajasthan v Puducherry

Vidarbha v Andhra

16 hours ago

Round 1 fixtures, Elite Group A

The following Elite Group A matches are scheduled for the first round of the Ranji Trophy, on October 11:

Baroda v Mumbai

Jammu & Kashmir v Maharashtra

Services v Meghalaya

Tripura v Odisha

Series In Focus
